title: Easy Chocolate Peanut Butter Balls
directions: Mix the peanut butter, butter, brown sugar and powdered sugar together. Roll into 1 inch balls (not any larger). Stick the dough into the refrigerator until cool. Next dip them into the melted chocolate. Set the chocolate coated ball onto wax paper and cool. Keep in theÂ refrigerator until you are ready to eat them!
